honors_and_awards.title: Third prize at ASME AEROMANIA at ASME E-fest 2020
honors_and_awards.description: Team has secured third position at ASME Aeromania at ASME E-fest Asia Pacific 2020, Rajkot The cash prize was Rs 10,000/- In this competition, teams had to built the RC aircraft and test its maneuverabilities according to problem statement offered and tackle the obstacles organised

honors_and_awards.title: Winner of Old Guard Oral Competition at ASME E-Fest Asia Pacific 2020
honors_and_awards.description: Secured first place at Old Guard Oral Competition at ASME E-Fest Asia Pacific 2020 at Rajkot, Marwadi University. The cash prize was $ 750 The Competition was based on presenting the project work or research work on any of domains like mechanical, aerospace, etc

honors_and_awards.title: Winner (1st) Prize at Aerolift championship at MIT, Pune
honors_and_awards.description: Team has secured first position at Aerolift championship at MIT, Pune The cash prize was Rs 12,000/- In this competition, teams had to built the RC aircraft and test its maneuverabilities according to problem statement offered and tackle the obstacles organised

honors_and_awards.title: Runner up (2nd) prize at ASME AEROMANIA at ASME E-fest 2019
honors_and_awards.description: Team has secured second position at ASME Aeromania at ASME E-fest Asia Pacific 2019, VIT Vellore The cash prize was Rs 15,000/- In this competition, teams had to built the RC aircraft and test its maneuverabilities according to problem statement offered and tackle the obstacles organised
